description.value:
Consumable (Substance)

Tsiraki is a blue-colored alcoholic beverage crafted from fermented salakberries and pickling spices. As an action, you can apply this substance to a creature within 5 feet. For the next hour, the creature experiences a high that allows them to roll an additional [[/r d12]] when making an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw using Charisma. At the end of the high, the creature must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or experience a low that lasts 8 hours, during which they must roll a [[/r d12]] and subtract the result when making an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw using Charisma. At the end of the low, the creature must make a DC 24 Wisdom saving throw to resist addiction.

Â 

Tsiraki

Tsiraki is a blue-colored alcoholic beverage crafted from fermented salakberries and pickling spices. As an action, you can apply this substance to a creature within 5 feet. For the next minute, the creature experiences a high that allows them to roll an additional [[/r d3]] when making an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw using Charisma. At the end of the high, the creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or experience a low that lasts 10 minutes, during which they must roll a [[/r d3]] and subtract the result when making an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw using Charisma. At the end of the low, the creature must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw to resist addiction.
